name: Cloud of Daggers
description:
You conjure spinning daggers in a 5-foot Cube centered on a point within range. Each creature in that area takes 4d4 Slashing damage. A creature also takes this damage if it enters the Cube or ends its turn there. A creature takes this damage only once per turn.

On your later turns, you can take a Magic action to teleport the Cube up to 30 feet.

damage.condition: Each creature in the area on cast, on entry, or when ending its turn there; once per turn

subsequentTurnAction.description: Teleport the Cube up to 30 feet

scaling.description: The damage increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 2.
